about_the_game:
📌FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE PLAY THE GAME WITH MICROPHONE📌

Step into the Nightmare

In Eli’s Dreams, every moment is drenched in dread. You’re Eli, a young boy trapped in an unending cycle of haunting dreams. The only way out? Solve the mysteries of each dream, rescue lost children, and retrieve the dolls that tether you back to reality. But beware: the horrors lurking within are relentless, and your screams might cost you everything.

Key Features

Microphone-Detection Mechanic

  • Stay calm… or else. If the game detects you scream, you’ll wake up — and start over.

  • Every sound matters, so silence isn't just golden — it’s survival.

Dreamlike Worlds, Each More Horrific Than the Last

  • Each dream introduces a unique setting, new enemies, and challenges that keep the terror fresh.

  • Experience a world that feels alive, yet horrifyingly wrong.

  • Dynamic sound design, chilling visuals, and unpredictable AI keep the tension sky-high.

Find the Dolls, Escape the Nightmare

  • Every dream has a single goal: find the doll and return it to your room to wake up.

  • Fail, and the dream becomes your eternal prison.

What Lies Ahead

The demo introduces Eli’s harrowing journey, but the full game will delve deeper into his darkest dreams:

  • Unique Enemies for Each Dream: No two nightmares are the same. From shadowy lurkers to frenetic hunters, every foe will challenge you differently.

  • Expanding Dreamscapes: Explore surreal and terrifying new locations, each with its own atmosphere and mechanics.

  • A Chilling Story: Uncover the mystery of Eli’s dreams and the connection between the dolls, the children, and the towering nightmare that stalks him.

Do You Have the Nerve?

📌 Add Eli’s Dreams to your wishlist now and prepare for a horror experience unlike any other.
